text: Yamamkela ke iNkosi yakhe (uAllâh) ngolwamkelo olulungileyo. Wamenza ukuba akhule enesimilo esihle. Wamgcina phantsi kohoyo lukaZakariyah. Wayethi qho (uZakariyah) xa engena kwigumbi lakhe lokuthandazela, (uMaryam) amfumane eziselwe ukutya. Athi: “Hini na Maryam: Ukufumene phi na oku?” Athi yena: “Oku kuvela kuAllâh. Inene uAllâh Ubonelela ngesixhaso lowo Athande ukumbonelela ngaphandle komlinganiselo.”
